General.Name: Safkar Ege Sogutmacilik Klima Soguk Hava Tesisleri Ihracat Ithalat Sanayi ve Tic
General.Description: Safkar Ege Sogutmacilik Klima Soguk Hava Tesisleri Ihracat Ithalat Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces and sells air conditioners. It offers commercial air conditioners for vehicles, such as minibuses, midi buses, buses, and refrigerators; crank-driven and electrical frigorific systems; light-rail system air conditioners and rail vehicles; and special application air conditioners, as well as air conditioners for the defense industry. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.
General.Address: Ulukent Sanayi Bolgesi 29 Ekim Mah, Izmir, Turkey, 10001
